sentences.en: As time goes by and his position becomes stronger, will he attempt any individual vendetta ?
sentences.cn: 万一他的地位越来越坚固之后, 他是否会采取个人的族间 仇杀 .

sentences.en: For years he pursued a vendetta against the Morris family.
sentences.cn: 多年来他一直在寻求向莫里斯家族报世仇.

sentences.en: He has accused the media of pursuing a vendetta against him.
sentences.cn: 他指责媒体长期跟他过不去。

sentences.en: His murder was a vendetta killing.
Since then Reed has been waging a vendetta against Baker and Young.
sentences.cn: 从那以后里德就一直伺机报复贝克和杨.

sentences.en: The only verdict is vengeance a vendetta held as a votive not in vain.
sentences.cn: 唯一的结论就是复仇一种仇恨作为一种虚无的奉献.

sentences.en: The two sides have been engaged in a bitter private vendetta.
The vice president said the cartoonist has a personal vendetta against him.
sentences.cn: 副总裁说那个漫画家和他有私怨。

sentences.en: They may also solve the puzzle of Stan's nemesis'terrifying vendetta against him.
sentences.cn: 它们也许还能解答Stan的复仇女神为什么对他有这样的深仇大恨的谜题.

sentences.en: V : The only verdict is vengeance, a vendetta, held as a votive not in vain.
sentences.cn: 唯一的结论就是复仇, 一种仇恨, 作为一种虚无的奉献.

sentences.en: Vendetta is no joke, you know.
sentences.cn: 仇杀不是开玩笑, 你知道的.

words.tran_cn: （尤指族间或血亲间的）仇杀；深仇

trans.tran_en: a long violent argument between two groups or people, especially one that is about something that happened in the past
